data: `minecraft:behavior.stomp_attack` allows an entity to attack using stomp AoE damage behavior.

data.Name: attack_once
data.Description: Allows the entity to use this attack behavior, only once EVER.

data.Name: attack_types
data.Description: Defines the entity types this entity will attack.

data.Name: cooldown_time
data.Description: Cooldown time (in seconds) between attacks.

data.Name: inner_boundary_time_increase
data.Description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when the target is beyond the "path_inner_boundary".

data.Name: max_dist
data.Description: Unused. No effect on "minecraft:behavior.melee_attack".

data.Name: max_path_time
data.Description: Maximum base time (in seconds) to recalculate new attack path to target (before increases applied).

data.Name: melee_fov
data.Description: Field of view (in degrees) when using the sensing component to detect an attack target.

data.Name: min_path_time
data.Description: Minimum base time (in seconds) to recalculate new attack path to target (before increases applied).

data.Name: no_damage_range_multiplier
data.Description: Multiplied with the final AoE damage range to determine a no damage range. The stomp attack will go on cooldown if target is in this no damage range.

data.Name: on_attack
data.Description: Defines the event to trigger when this entity successfully attacks.

data.Name: outer_boundary_time_increase
data.Description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when the target is beyond the "path_outer_boundary".

data.Name: path_fail_time_increase
data.Description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when this entity cannot move along the current path.

data.Name: path_inner_boundary
data.Description: Distance at which to increase attack path recalculation by "inner_boundary_tick_increase".

data.Name: path_outer_boundary
data.Description: Distance at which to increase attack path recalculation by "outer_boundary_tick_increase".

data.Name: random_stop_interval
data.Description: This entity will have a 1 in N chance to stop it's current attack, where N = "random_stop_interval".

data.Name: reach_multiplier
data.Description: Used with the base size of the entity to determine minimum target-distance before trying to deal attack damage.

data.Name: require_complete_path
data.Description: Toggles (on/off) the need to have a full path from the entity to the target when using this melee attack behavior.

data.Name: set_persistent
data.Description: Allows the actor to be set to persist upon targeting a player

data.Name: speed_multiplier
data.Description: This multiplier modifies the attacking entity's speed when moving toward the target.

data.Name: stomp_range_multiplier
data.Description: Multiplied with the base size of the entity to determine stomp AoE damage range.

data.Name: target_dist
data.Description: Unused. No effect on "minecraft:behavior.melee_attack".

data.Name: track_target
data.Description: Allows the entity to track the attack target, even if the entity has no sensing.

data.Name: x_max_rotation
data.Description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

data.Name: y_max_head_rotation
data.Description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the Y-axis, this entity can rotate its head while trying to look at the target.
